title: Nightfall: Book One of the Nightsong Space Opera
description: With evil star empires, Celtic-Asian space pirate triads, ancient battleships, super-soldier clones, telepathic assassins, professional torturers, desperate mercenaries, massive space fleets, Royal families, out-of-control corporations, Quantum wizards, and sex-bots; The Nightsong series is intended for space opera fans who are all grown up, but still young at heart.
author: Maximillian d'Erembourg
